mapper.select: SELECT r.res_id -- 예약 id ,r.member_email -- 사용자 id ,c.car_name ,r.res_startDate -- 시작일 ,r.res_endDate -- 종료일 ,r.res_date -- 예약한 일자 ,r.res_totalPrice -- 총 대여 금액 ,r.res_place FROM reservation r join car c ON r.car_id = c.car_id WHERE member_email IN ( SELECT member_email FROM member WHERE member_email = #{member_email} ) ORDER BY res_id DESC;
